### Row {height="85%"}

```{ojs}




Plot.plot({
  y: {grid: true},
  color: {legend: true},
  title: "Distribution of body mass, "+radios+" penguins",
  marks: [
    Plot.rectY(data.filter(d=>d.species === radios), Plot.binX({y: "count"}, {x: "body_mass_g"})),
    Plot.ruleY([0]),
  ]
})
```
